ЁЯХпя╕П
Last Mughal Emperor

Title: 'Zafar' (pen name). He was an excellent Urdu poet.
Revolt of 1857: The rebels declared him 'Emperor of India'. After the suppression of the revolt, the British arrested him from Humayun's Tomb.

тЫУя╕П
Exile and End

His sons (Mirza Mughal, Mirza Khizr Sultan) were killed. Zafar was exiled to Rangoon (Burma/Myanmar), where he died in 1862. He wrote about his misfortune: 'How unfortunate is Zafar for burial, not even two yards of land were found in the lane of the beloved.' With this, the Mughal Empire came to an end.
